TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , LOC .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of LOC ( ORG ) allowed the applicant 's claim against the ORG housing authority of ORG ( квартирно-эксплуатационная часть PERSON г.Черняховска ) for provision of accommodation . ORG ordered that the housing authority :

“ ... provide PERSON , whose family comprises CARDINAL member , with another well - equipped dwelling LOC for permanent use having a living surface of no less than established standards of living surface for CARDINAL person ( QUANTITY ) , corresponding to the established sanitary and technical standards and well - equipped in accordance with the standards applied in GPE ... ”
CARDINAL . ORG also awarded the applicant MONEY ( RUR ) in respect of non - pecuniary damage .
CARDINAL . On DATE the housing authority allocated to the applicant a CARDINAL - room flat . However , she did not accept the flat as it did not meet sanitary standards .
CARDINAL . No appeal was brought against the judgment of DATE and it entered into force on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiffs ' service of the LOC initiated enforcement proceedings and on DATE the defendant executed the judgment of DATE as regards the compensation for non - pecuniary damage .

CARDINAL . A special commission of the housing authority visited the flat allocated to the applicant on DATE and concluded , on DATE , that it was only equipped in part and occupied by another person .

CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the housing authority unsuccessfully applied to ORG for the re - opening of the proceedings due to the newly discovered circumstances . They claimed that according to the decision of the Government of GPE of DATE , the housing premises of ORG had been handed over to the local administration . Therefore it was not possible to enforce the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE , following the bailiff 's request , ORG noted that the housing authority had handed over to the local administration only some housing LOC . The court ordered the bailiff to establish which LOC were left at the disposal of the housing authority and to provide the applicant with CARDINAL of them .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the bailiff fined the Head of the housing authority for the failure to enforce the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the housing authority and the applicant 's representative concluded a social tenancy agreement by which a flat was allocated to the applicant . On DATE the applicant signed a document by which she accepted the proposed accommodation .
